ai-sn32:1.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you about the gods of the clouds.
ai-sn32:1.1.3_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.
ai-sn32:1.1.4_0: And what are the gods of the clouds?
ai-sn32:1.1.5_0: There are gods of the cool clouds,
ai-sn32:1.1.10_0: These are called the gods of the clouds.”
ai-sn32:1.1.11_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-sn32:2.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of the clouds?”
ai-sn32:2.1.4_0: “Mendicant, take someone who does good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn32:2.1.6_0: ‘The gods of the clouds are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn32:2.1.8_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the gods of the clouds!’
ai-sn32:2.1.9_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the gods of the clouds.
ai-sn32:2.1.10_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of the clouds.”
ai-sn32:3-12.0.3_0: Ten Discourses On How Giving Helps to Become a cool breeze, Etc.
ai-sn32:3-12.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of cool clouds?”
ai-sn32:3-12.1.4_0: “Mendicant, take someone who does good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn32:3-12.1.6_0: ‘The gods of cool clouds are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn32:3-12.1.8_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the gods of the cool clouds!’
ai-sn32:3-12.1.11_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the gods of cool clouds.
ai-sn32:3-12.1.12_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of cool clouds.”
ai-sn32:13-52.0.3_0: Right away they want to decorate it.
ai-sn32:13-52.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of warm clouds ...
ai-sn32:13-52.1.7_0: “Mendicant, take someone who does good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn32:13-52.1.9_0: ‘The gods of rainy clouds are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn32:13-52.1.11_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the gods of rainy clouds!’
ai-sn32:13-52.1.14_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the gods of rainy clouds.
ai-sn32:13-52.1.15_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of rainy clouds.”
ai-sn32:53.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why sometimes it becomes cool?”
ai-sn32:53.1.4_0: “Mendicant, there are what are called gods of the cool clouds.
ai-sn32:53.1.6_0: ‘Why don’t we revel in our own kind of enjoyment?’ Then, in accordance with their wish, it becomes cool.
ai-sn32:53.1.7_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why sometimes it becomes cool.”
ai-sn32:54.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why sometimes it becomes warm?”
ai-sn32:54.1.4_0: “Mendicant, there are what are called gods of the warm clouds.
ai-sn32:54.1.6_0: ‘Why don’t we revel in our own kind of enjoyment?’ Then, in accordance with their wish, it becomes warm.
ai-sn32:54.1.7_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why sometimes it becomes warm.”
ai-sn32:55.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why sometimes it becomes stormy?”
ai-sn32:55.1.4_0: “Mendicant, there are what are called gods of the storm clouds.
ai-sn32:55.1.6_0: ‘Why don’t we revel in our own kind of enjoyment?’ Then, in accordance with their wish, it becomes stormy.
ai-sn32:55.1.7_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why sometimes it becomes stormy.”
ai-sn32:56.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why sometimes it becomes windy?”
ai-sn32:56.1.4_0: “Mendicant, there are what are called gods of the windy clouds.
ai-sn32:56.1.6_0: ‘Why don’t we revel in our own kind of enjoyment?’ Then, in accordance with their wish, it becomes windy.
ai-sn32:56.1.7_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why sometimes it becomes windy.”
ai-sn32:57.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why sometimes it rains?”
ai-sn32:57.1.4_0: “Mendicant, there are what are called gods of the rainy clouds.
ai-sn32:57.1.6_0: ‘Why don’t we revel in our own kind of enjoyment?’ Then, in accordance with their wish, it becomes rainy.
ai-sn32:57.1.7_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why sometimes it rains.”
ai-sn32:57.1.9_0: The seventh section on Wisdom is finished.
ai-sn32:57.2.5_0: The Linked Discourses on gods of the clouds are complete.
